definition: to take note of/to pay attention to
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

the Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention, a military doctrine issued in 1928 by Mao Zedong for the Red Army, which included a number of injunctions demanding high standards of behavior and respect for civilians during wartime
pinyin: San1 Da4 Ji4 lu:4 Ba1 Xiang4 Zhu4 yi4
zhu4 yi4 li4 bu4 zu2 guo4 dong4 zheng4
zhu4 yi4 li4 que1 shi1 zheng4
zhu4 yi4 li4 que1 xian4 duo1 dong4 zheng4
zhu4 yi4 li4 que1 xian4 guo4 dong4 zheng4

sentences.english: In those days we did not need spies to watch the enemy's movement .
sentences.chinese: 在那些日子里，我们不需要情报员注意敌人动向。

sentences.english: The nature of the stimulus may predispose some children to attention problems.
sentences.chinese: 刺激本身很可能使一些孩子易产生注意力问题。

sentences.english: The bright colours on the wall caught our attention.
sentences.chinese: 墙壁上鲜艳的颜色吸引了我们的注意力。

sentences.english: Reading is good, but we have to choose what to read.
sentences.chinese: 读书是一好事，但我们必须多加注意书的选择。

sentences.english: And light multitaskers might be better at preserving their attention.
sentences.chinese: 并且轻度的一心多用者可能更擅长保持注意力。

sentences.english: Note that the standard requires an empty line after the headers too.
sentences.chinese: 注意该标准同样要求在域头之后要有个空行。

sentences.english: In opening wider to the outside world, we must pay great attention to safeguarding our national economic security.
sentences.chinese: 在扩大对外开放中，要十分注意维护国家经济安全。

sentences.english: Thirdly, to obtain employment successfully, ex-servicemen should bring into play their predominance themselves too.
sentences.chinese: 再者，退役军人在就业时也应当注意发挥自身优势。

sentences.english: And you, didn't you notice it?
sentences.chinese: 你呢，你也没有注意号头？

sentences.english: Remind FeiEr exhibition peng, to pay more attention to their image.
sentences.chinese: 展鹏提醒非儿今非昔比，要多注意自己的形象。

sentences.english: One of the Murphys' neighbors also noticed 'unusual' traits.
sentences.chinese: 墨菲夫妇的一个邻居也注意到他们与众不同的特点。

sentences.english: In this movie we often pay attention to a vocabulary of "institutionalized".
sentences.chinese: 在这个影片里我经常注意的一个词“体制化”。

sentences.english: But be careful: much of it is garbage.
sentences.chinese: 但是，请注意，它们很多都只是垃圾。

sentences.english: It's such a mystery, but the NBA seems to be demystifying the whole idea.
sentences.chinese: 他是如此神秘，但是NBA似乎有了解开秘密的注意。

sentences.english: And yet these things go relatively unnoticed.
sentences.chinese: 这些事情不太引人注意。

sentences.english: Please note that the activation code can be used only on a single phone and is not transferrable .
sentences.chinese: 请注意激活码只能在一台手机上使用，不可以传递。

definition: to be mindful/to pay attention to/to take note of
to remind/to call attention to/to warn of
in order to avoid/so as not to
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
to avert/to prevent/to avoid/to refrain from
to be careful/to pay attention to
(so as) to avoid/to prevent/(just) in case
best/(you) had better (do what we suggest)
to avoid as taboo/to avoid by all means
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
to prevent/to guard against/to take precautions
